channel.title: Compile question
channel.description: Almost every source i download when i hit compile i get the error "The system could not find the path specified" ... I have JDK 6u2 and some sources work but most dont

item.title: Compile question
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

use this

@echo off :build cls "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java pause goto :build

Read full topic

item.title: Compile question
item.dc:creator: @prankster113 prankster113
item.description:
@prankster113 wrote:

[quote=“Gl Then Gf, post:2, topic:412526”]most compiler you have to edit to put ur 6u2…

plus get the lastest jdk,…

il give u a code for you.

@echo off
@TITLE compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished! press any key to continue…
pause
exit[/quote]
i still got an error message…
"javac: file not found: *.javac
usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options

Read full topic

item.title: Compile question
item.dc:creator: @Gl_Then_Gf Gl Then Gf
item.description:
@Gl_Then_Gf wrote:

most compiler you have to edit to put ur 6u2…

plus get the lastest jdk,…

il give u a code for you.

@echo off
@TITLE compiler
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished! press any key to continue…
pause
exit

Read full topic
